verses.verse: "I am the Vine, the True Vine, and My Father is the Farmer.
Every limb in Me not carrying fruit, He takes it off. And every limb carrying fruit, He prunes it so that it may carry more fruit.
You are already clean because of the message that I have spoken to you.
Stay in Me and I in you. Just as the limb isn't able to be carrying fruit out from itself if it doesn't stay in the vine, so neither can you if you don't stay in Me.
I am the Vine. You are the limbs. The person staying in Me and I in him, this person carries much fruit because separate from Me you are not able to be doing anything.
If anyone didn't stay in Me, he was thrown outside as the limb, he was shriveled up, they gather them together, they throw them into a fire, and he is burned.
If you stay in Me and My statements stay in you, whatever you want you will ask for it, and it will happen to you.
In this My Father was made magnificent, so that you may carry much fruit and you will become students to Me.
Just as the Father loved Me, I also loved you. Stay in the love, My love.
If you keep My demands, you will stay in My love, just as I have kept the demands of my Father, and I stay in His love.
I have spoken these things to you so that the happiness, My happiness, might stay in you and your happiness might be filled up.
This is the demand, My demand, that you should love each other, just as I loved you.
No one has a greater love than this, that someone would put his soul out there on behalf of his friends.
You are My friends if you do as many things as I demand you.

I no longer call you slaves because the slave does not realize what his master is doing, but I have stated that you are friends because everything that I heard from the side of My Father I made known to you.
You did not select Me, but I selected you and placed you so that you may go back, carry fruit, and your fruit stay, so that whatever you ask the Father for in My name, He might give you.
These things I demand you so that you may love each other.
If the world hates you, you know that it has hated Me first before you.
If you were from the world, the world would be fond of its own. Because you are not from the world, but I selected you from the world, because of this the world hates you.
Remember the message that I said to you, 'A slave is not greater than his master.' If they pursued Me, they also will pursue you. If they kept My message, they also will keep yours.
But they will do all these things to you because of My name, because they do not know the One who sent Me.
If I did not come and speak to them, they were not having sin, but now they do not have a sham about their sin.
The person hating Me also hates My Father.
If I didn't do the actions among them that no one else has done, they were not having sin. Now, they have both seen and hated both Me and My Father.
But it happened so that the message (the one that has been written in their law (in Psalm 35:19 and 69:4) might be accomplished, 'They hated Me for nothing.'
When that Encourager comes whom I will send to you from the side of the Father (the Spirit of the Truth that travels out from the side of the Father), He will tell what He witnesses about Me.
And you are telling what you witnessed because from the beginning you are with Me."
